word: \n     \"If thou wilt be perfect,\" Christ said, \"go and sell that thou hast, and give to the poor, and thou shalt have treasure in heaven: and come and follow me.\" Jesus needed the co-operation of just such men, whom God had intrusted with his goods. It is God's plan that those to whom he has given money or houses or lands shall act as his faithful almoners, relieving the sufferings of their fellow beings, and in this way winning them to the Saviour.
